Parameters: int: The new width of the surface
int: The new height of the surface
onSurfaceTextureSizeChanged(android.grap.Description: Invoked when the @B_android#graphics#SurfaceTexture_E@'s buffers size changed.
onSurfaceTextureSizeChanged(android.grap.FullName: public abstract void onSurfaceTextureSizeChanged (SurfaceTexture surface, int width, int height)

Parameters: SurfaceTexture: The surface about to be destroyed
onSurfaceTextureDestroyed(android.graphi.Description: Invoked when the specified @B_android#graphics#SurfaceTexture_E@ is about to be destroyed. If returns true, no rendering should happen inside the surface texture after this method is invoked. If returns false, the client needs to call @B_android#graphics#SurfaceTexture#release_E@. Most applications should return true.

Parameters: int: The width of the surface
int: The height of the surface
onSurfaceTextureAvailable(android.graphi.Description: Invoked when a @B_android#view#TextureView_E@'s SurfaceTexture is ready for use.
onSurfaceTextureAvailable(android.graphi.FullName: public abstract void onSurfaceTextureAvailable (SurfaceTexture surface, int width, int height)

onSurfaceTextureUpdated(android.graphics.Description: Invoked when the specified @B_android#graphics#SurfaceTexture_E@ is updated through @B_android#graphics#SurfaceTexture#updateTexImage_E@.

ClassDesc: This listener can be used to be notified when the surface texture associated with this texture view is available.
